== CQELS engine ==


===Installation===

The CQELS engine can be downloaded as  [http://cqels.googlecode.com/files/cqels.jar as file].

=== Running the experiment codes ====
{{{
export MINMEM=2048
export MAXMEM=4096
export RUNMODE=single
export CQELSDATA=/home/user/cqels/data
export CQELSHOME=/home/user/cqels
export STREAMSIZE=10000
export SLEEP=30
export DATASIZE=100k
export PRELOADED=true
export AUTHORNO=1

java -Xms${MINMEM}m -Xmx${MAXMEM}m -jar cqels.jar $RUNMODE $CQELSDATA $CQELSHOME query1 $DATASIZE $STREAMSIZE $PRELOADED $AUTHORNO
}}}
